      • scrollDrags

        public Drag[] scrollDrags(double scrollArrowSize,
                          double scrollThick)
        Description copied from interface: Widget
        For scrollable widgets, compute drag segments of scrolling options.
        Specified by:
        scrollDrags in interface Widget
        Parameters:
        scrollArrowSize - The size of scrolling arrows.
        scrollThick - The scroller thickness.
        Returns:
        'null' for non-scrollable widgets or a set of drags, from (x1,y1) to (x2,y2), otherwise.
